website_summaries.verdict: Whitening gel contains dental-grade 44% carbamide peroxide in mint-flavor. Could remove years of stains from coffee, wine, soda, tea, smoking, and more.
pros: Strong formula for the deep stains
Can use Invisalign retainers with gel
A stronger solution than most, but some users may not have any sensitivity
Try using every 3rd day and you could see results after a week
Very small amount of product goes a long way
cons: Does not work as quickly as whitening strips
Whitens only a little bit and causes sensitivity to both gums and teeth

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, been looking for something like this to do at home .. Very easy to use and amazing results .. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: P. Mullins, Baker

customer_reviews.title: This stuff works!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my daughter, thinking that it wasn’t really going to work. I couldn’t have been more wrong! Her teeth were 2 shades whiter in just 10 days. We waited two weeks and then whitened a few more days and her teeth look great! No tooth sensitivity, no gum irritation, noticibly whiter teeth and I couldn’t be happier. Have already told others about this great system!
customer_reviews.author: picky mom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing results
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best teeth whitening gel I’ve ever used. It is better than the one I receive from the dentist. What I love about this product is that it doesn’t make my teeth feel sensitive. That was a big problem for me with other whitening gels. I also love how you can get great results after just 30 minutes and instead of hours. I will definitely be buy Auraglow again!
customer_reviews.author: Dimples

customer_reviews.title: This is the best whitening system I have tried yet
customer_reviews.text: This is the best whitening system I have tried yet. However, I apply the whitening gel directly to my teeth, making sure to get in between teeth. I do not use any more product than recommended. Then I put the tray back in and proceed with the LED light. I see that you can now purchase trays you can mold to your mouth. I think this would obviously provide a tighter fit, but for those of you who do not want to purchase another product, application of the gel directly to your teeth may improve your results.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia

customer_reviews.title: So Far so good! I've used it for four days and I ...
customer_reviews.text: So Far so good! I've used it for four days and I already see a difference, Sensitivity isnt bad.. I've always used the tubes that mix as they dispense so this is the first time that Ive used this type. I lost my retainers that I use as bleaching trays so I have to get new ones.. But as far as I'm concerned ive switched my brand to Auraglow
customer_reviews.author: Jason August

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several different brands, and this one (44%) works the best with the Teeth Whitening Light by Starlite Smile. 16 LED Teeth Whitener w/ 3 Adapters for iPhone, Android & USB (compatible with 4G and newer). Thirty minutes every morning for two weeks and my teeth (two decades worth of stains) are at least, if not more, five shades whiter.
customer_reviews.author: Li88

customer_reviews.title: Corrected!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome customer service! On the original order, one of the tubes was thin as water, Auraglow customer service attributed this could have been due to excessive heat during storage or shipping; regardless, they immediately sent a complete new set of three tubes! not just the tube I had complained about. I hope the product works as well as the customer service. I will change review to 5 stars if it does. I will say my teeth haven't felt this good in years.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great product after receiving replacement
customer_reviews.text: The first tubes I received were watery and had leaked but the company quickly contacted me and sent out a replacement. The second whitening tubes are great and not at all watery :) Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kessa

customer_reviews.title: I should have read the reviews: INACTIVE SYRINGES! They NEED TO HAVE BUBBLES!
customer_reviews.text: I should have read the reviews before purchasing AuraGlow Teeth Whitening Gel Syringe Refills. Upon arrival, I had realized that there were little to no bubbles in all 3 of my syringes, but I didn't realize that the bubbles is what indicated that the product was active. After using the product for a week, I noticed NO CHANGE to my teeth. So it looks like I received a set of duds...I hope Amazon will still allow me to return this product...
customer_reviews.author: RVS

customer_reviews.title: Usually teeth whitening strips/gel makes my teeth sensitive by day ...
customer_reviews.text: Usually teeth whitening strips/gel makes my teeth sensitive by day 2 but I barely just felt a tingle with this! And I didn't notice my teeth getting whiter until I actually look at my photos with the same lighting!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: It’s ok. Nothing noticeable but maybe I have pretty white teeth to begin with. Have used this gel with the LED mouth light to “ boost” (yah right) efficacy over five times now for about 30 min each time. Nothing to write home about. I’ve used crest whitestrips two times and had more POW than this. What a waste. It’s probably clear sugar gel with no actual lightening ingredients bc that’s how NOT effective it is. It’s great that there’s no sensitivity since I’m super sensitive and that’s why I don’t like the strips. I suffer for a day or two after those. But maybe I’m not sensitive to this bc they’re not actually lightening my teeth. Placebo effect?
customer_reviews.author: Beauty Maven

customer_reviews.title: It works!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the whitening kit first and then I ordered this like a month after. While I considered going for cheaper gel I didn’t want to risk it and AuraGlow never dissapointed. I didn’t get results after the first treatment like some people say, but trust me when I tell you this gel is worth it. I drink coffee 4 times a day, black, and this gel managed to make my teeth white again regardless. I’m super happy with the product and totally recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Product goes bad long before expiration date!
customer_reviews.text: When I first used this gel it was fine, and did the job without any issues. I had stored it in "a cool, dark place" yet when I went to use it again several months later the gel had completely liquefied! And that was 14 months PRIOR to the expiration date. Fortunately I'd stored the box horizontally, top up, because when I removed it from the drawer the liquid ran out. It got on everything, and it was sticky. So, do I recommend this product? Yes, IF you can use all of it within the first couple of months. I barely used one of the 3 syringes so I feel a bit ripped off, and will not buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: S. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Poor shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this in August. Worked finand was initially happy with the product. However, went to use it today and the "gel" was completely liquid. I had 2 completely sealed never opened syringes and they were also completely unusable. Very disappointed. I've purchased other brands before and had no issue with shelf life. Will not be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph p gENTILE

customer_reviews.title: Save your money! Doesn't work & damages your gums
customer_reviews.text: I wanted this to work so bad, but it didn't. I followed directions, but my gums were too sensitive for the contents. After only 2 days using the suggested amount in a tray on my upper jaw for 15 min, my gums were so sore and bleeding badly. I waited 1 month to try again, this time just placing the product on my teeth and not in a tray. That helped for sensitivity, but I see no difference in stain removing or whitening. Way too much money, hassle, and pain for something that isn't working and only causing damage to your gums. Save your money!
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Great results
customer_reviews.text: This gel works and is easy to use. Great results in just one week. The mouth tray is comfortable and soft, yet firm and stays put. I suggest applying the gel directly to your teeth and then inserting the mouth tray with light already attached, rather than filling the mouth tray with the gel. This way the gel is right on your teeth where it's supposed to be for whitening. I found that when I filled the tray with gel, the gel did not touch all of my individual tooth surfaces and was just a waste of gel and time.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: used two different OTC stuff and find this one the best priced. I use it with my Invisalign tray
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived with one syringe already open and had leaked. Regardless, the gel is very effective. After one use, I did already notice a difference and received a compliment. I've had my teeth professionally bleached a couple of times over the past years, used two different OTC stuff and find this one the best priced. I use it with my Invisalign tray. If it had arrived damaged, it would have received 5 stars!
customer_reviews.author: LeeLoo

customer_reviews.title: Whitening POWER
customer_reviews.text: I started out using 35% whitening products and went to 44% only thing is when I went up in strength I was a bit more careful not to overdo the product as it could cause irrational pain or problems but it States it right on box. I did 7 days straight and up keep maybe 1 or 2 times a week, depending on how & much you eat or drink stain contributing liquid or food or if you smoke etc... so I do my own schedule what’s right for me as each individual should play with it and you can administer it with a Q-Tip.
customer_reviews.author: HokeyPokey55

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the light to facilitate brightening and didn't buy the trays. Just apply with Q-tip (less is more), bite down on the light and wait 30-mins. Because of light gadget, can't speak or any other mouth-opening movements. Light beeps every 10-mins. so just click again for next interval (handy reminder). Simple to use and getting whiter every day.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: can make your teeth hurt
customer_reviews.text: This product works great for whitening your teeth but for first time users, pay attention to how much you are using and start out with the shortest time which is about 10 minutes. I tried to do the recommendation of 30 minutes right away and was not prepared for how much it made my teeth ache even after i rinsed my mouth thoroughly. after a few uses i dont even notice it and i am happy with how much better/whiter my teeth look!
customer_reviews.author: Alivia Hammond

customer_reviews.title: Not working for me
customer_reviews.text: This whitening gel just is not working for me. I purchased the 30%, finished it (10 treatments) with no results. So I purchased the 45% - nothing. If anything my teeth are even more stained. But, I have zero sensitivity with this carbamide gel vs the peroxide crest strips or professional bleach which is why I decided to try it. I will just have to suffer the pain with the peroxide because this is not working at all even if I leave for 1 hour. Now my husband has sensitivity with this gel but not the peroxide. Go figure...
customer_reviews.author: Mimi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Outstanding customer service.
customer_reviews.text: My original review was not terribly positive (watery, empty syringe). But, AuraGlow took the initiative and reached out to me with a replacement.I can now say that I am very happy with the product AND with the seller! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: km

customer_reviews.title: Great results, zero sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: Great whitening results- I literally get sooo many compliments on how white my teeth are from family and strangers alike. Even my dentist was impressed and asked me what I use (seriously). I have zero sensitivity even when paired with a whitening toothpaste. I’ve been using this for a while now so I only have to use it once every few months but I did use it for a week straight to get my teeth to the desired shade. I would 100% recommend this product over traditional whitening strips. It even works without the light.
customer_reviews.author: NMM

customer_reviews.title: This product works!
customer_reviews.text: In five days of use, I noticed a 3 shade improvement in my teeth coloring. I used the 44% Carbamide Peroxide because I can use less of the product. This is a strong whitener that doesn't burn your gums. The 35% Carbamide Peroxide is okay but I didn't notice more than a one shade improvement in my teeth. The bad part is the taste. It's horrible. Given my results, I would recommend this product. It's one of the best whiteners under $100 dollars. 5 Stars for its effectiveness. 2 Stars for the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew A.

customer_reviews.title: Product viability
customer_reviews.text: I tried using the product and the"gel" (if it ever existed) was liquid. I checked the other syringes and the contents were liquid too. I should have returned the product, but I threw it out in disgust.
customer_reviews.author: Dolores  Potos

customer_reviews.title: Mildew
customer_reviews.text: I did not use the gel promptly. The gel appears to react to light, so I kept it in a cool, dry, dark drawer, unopened before using. After applying it to my whitening appliances and inserting them into my mouth, I became aware of a strong odor of mildew. Very distressing. Threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Hobby Poppy

customer_reviews.title: It Works!
customer_reviews.text: It works! A bit less thick. But it works great. I only use a BB size bit in my custom teeth tray from my Dentist. I also used it with their light. Love it. Did not burn or wasn't sensitive on gums or teeth and I have very sensitive teeth. Maybe because I left it on only 15 mins twice a day once a week instead of the recommended 30 mins at one time for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Fliegelman

customer_reviews.title: Fast, easy, no irritation of gums
customer_reviews.text: When I got fitted for a tooth bridge they selected a whiteness that matched the current color of my teeth. With time and over-use of the remaining teeth they had become dark and dull in comparison to the new bridge. 4X 30 minute treatments of AURAGLOW on the old teeth had my bridge and natural teeth back at the same shade again. It was quite remarkable.And just an FYI...it was a very important consideration that the product I bought was made in the USA. And AURAGLOW is.
customer_reviews.author: Peabody

customer_reviews.title: This product really works!
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was rather skeptical when I first ran across this product...I mean my dentist wanted hundreds of dollars for a whitening “system”. I ordered the starter kit and figured, “what did I have to lose but a couple of bucks”...I am sold! This works very well, is super easy AND CONVENIENT to use. Ian e no negatives and would only suggest to other skeptics...try this BEFORE you spend your hard earned money making your dentists next Merced’s Benz payment
customer_reviews.author: GIZMO

customer_reviews.title: Hit or Miss with this product
customer_reviews.text: unfortunately this batch was very thin in consistency and just didn't not work like the last batch.
customer_reviews.author: Mira L. Herrera

customer_reviews.title: Too good to be true
customer_reviews.text: I was really excited to get this product especially after all the amazing reviews. I ordered this plus 4 extra gels. I used it once a week for a month and had no change in teeth color. I also received a bright red card when I got the product that said if you have any problems email them first. This is how they are able to maintain such positive reviews. So when they say it’s too good to be true, believe it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Gel turned to liquid
customer_reviews.text: This gel turned to liquid (like water) after several months (I didn't use them right away). Also, from my previous initial order and 10 day treatment, the results were mixed. Didn't get nearly the results advertised. If you are looking for slightly whiter teeth this is the way to go. Certainly not a replacement for a trip to the dentist.
customer_reviews.author: ryanovelo

customer_reviews.title: gel?
customer_reviews.text: gel? my definition and their definition is not the same. liquid, not gel. useless.
customer_reviews.author: jc

customer_reviews.title: Love this product, no pain!
customer_reviews.text: I've used many whiteners over the years from Crest, to dollar brands, but this one is simply the best. I love that it doesn't hurt my teeth in any way and that with the added UV light you instantly see results after the first use. I recommend it for anyone that needs a tooth refresher.
customer_reviews.author: JPREVIEWS

customer_reviews.title: Just like another buyer had mentioned in his review I purchased ...
customer_reviews.text: I feel totally ripped off!! Just like another buyer had mentioned in his review I purchased this product because it has such wonderful reviews. The whitening gel did absolutely nothing for my teeth and I agree that it actually turned them a more grayish color. I felt no sensitivity whatsoever! Beware and DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT! The previous reviews cannot be real! This is a scam!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie R.

customer_reviews.title: This gel isn't working...I think I got a bad batch
customer_reviews.text: I've whitened my teeth before, using a few different methods...the Crest Whitestrips, a custom tray with gel provided by my dentist (33% strength), etc. I ordered the 44% strength here just to speed things up a bit, knowing that tooth/gum sensitivity could be worse. I usually feel sensitivity after the 2nd use if doing two evening treatments in 2 days. With this product, I feel almost no sensitivity ever, and my teeth are not whitening up at all. Either I was given an expired product, or it was far weaker than the label on the syringe states.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny W

customer_reviews.title: My “gel” turned to unusable liquid 1 1/2 years before expiration date.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product in July. Put it in a drawer and tried to use it today. To my surprise all the “gel” had turned to liquid. I tried using it anyway and it burned my mouth and tongue. The expiration date is 06/21. Do not purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dp

customer_reviews.title: Product knowledge and great reviews
customer_reviews.text: I liked that the syringes are big and easy to measure out the perfect amount for my trays. The flavor was good and didn’t cause any irritation to my gums like other brands. I noticed a difference after one application. I went with Auraglow because of the great reviews. Glad I chose such a good, affordable product, and will be a customer for a very long time! I will tell my friends and family about how amazing Auruglow works. Tammy Taylor
customer_reviews.author: Diane Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Degraded upon opening...
customer_reviews.text: This was a second shipment that I ordered a while back while still using the first. Just opened the box to fine (2) syringes half empty with contents having leaked out, even though capped/sealed. All are now the consistency of water. 'Use By' date is December of 2021. Stored in my air-conditioned closet. Seems like this is somewhat common, based on other reviews. Will not be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Robert H

customer_reviews.title: It does what it says, great whitening power
customer_reviews.text: This is the first whitening product that has ever really worked for me. I wish I had taken before and after pictures but didn’t. I just ordered my second box. I will continue to buy this whitening kit to keep my teeth whitened as needed. Thank you for making a product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Bdoll0523

customer_reviews.title: Liquid, Not Gel
customer_reviews.text: The first time I purchased this product was with the teach whitening kit and it worked created. However, when I bought these when the original ran out I was disappointed to find that the "gel" in all three syringes was more of a liquid consistency, making it near impossible to put in the whitening tray. Will be using a different brand when ordering next time.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: OK, No Obvious Difference After 3 Uses
customer_reviews.text: I used the product 3-4 times with the gel dispensed in a tray. Differences were hard to tell after the first few uses. I ended up switching to a whitening kit from my dentist and results were much much better. In hind site, I’d purchase the kit from the dentist instead of using this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Worked for a bit
customer_reviews.text: But then everything turned into pretty much water. Feels like wasted money. I've repurchased to give one more shot. Hopefully these won't turn to water and be trashed as the last ones bought in September just were.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I love this gel. I recently received a package but all the syringes were watery so I had to send it back for a replacement. I got the replacement really fast. My teeth look really nice and even though it is 44% it has never been bad on my gums.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Rios

customer_reviews.title: Watery Gel :(
customer_reviews.text: My gel had a watery consistency instead of a gel-like consistency. Pretty Disappointed UPDATE 3/6/18: AuraGlow reached out to me immediately and offered to send me a new pack free of charge. I just received my package in the mail and it's gel-consistency! Trying my first teeth whitening session tonight :) will update more with results later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The best!! Second purchase.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite teeth whitener!!! It works so fast and is so easy to use. I always do mine in the shower and do one round or two and I always get compliments on my teeth. This is the first whitener if used that doesn’t make my teeth sensitive too. This is my second purchase of it I’ve had the same light for two years and just bought more gel i don’t do it very often and I smoke and it keeps my teeth really white without having to do it constantly. Inexpensive and works really great!
customer_reviews.author: Tori

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Does not work.
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions precisely and my teeth showed no lightening whatsoever! I even tried using the Walmart mouth guards like another reviewer suggested. Still no whitening. I just read the review about bubbles in the syringe and mine had no bubbles either. Another dud I guess. I'd love to return them but there's nothing left but an empty box and unchanged teeth (what can I say? I'm an optimist). Time to give in and have the dentist do it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Product
customer_reviews.text: I recently started using AuraGlow whitening gel and I can already tell the difference. I've used professional trays and gel for years but have recently been experience gum sensitivity with the products I've used in the past so I decided to switch products. I read the reviews online and decided to try the product myself and I couldn't be happier. My teeth are whiter and I haven't been experiencing the gum sensitivity I have by using other products. Definitely happy with the product and will continue to use in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas clem

customer_reviews.title: Good price for this compared to dentist office
customer_reviews.text: I had my dentist make custom trays for whitening. I bought my first tube of whitener from the dentist, then I got smart and ordered this product. I got 4x as much product for what they charged and it was absolutely the same product.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle1981

customer_reviews.title: NOT 44%, NOT 35%, just plain inactive gel
customer_reviews.text: I've had a lower percentage from the dentist, and that stuff will burn if you leave it on your gums too long. This product did nothing. Their 35% did NOTHING, so I intended to buy 44% from another vendor buuuuuut like a dummy, I ordered this Aura again. So now I have 2 boxes of these syringes that do nothing. The "44%" syringes are identical to the "35%" syringes, neither of the unmarked syringes do anything. I have to assume they put the same garbage in different boxes.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Work
customer_reviews.text: I'm very dissatisfied with this product. I have used 15% carbamide peroxide that was more effective than this "44%". I'm not convinced that it's actually carbamide peroxide. The consistency is different from what I have used from several different sources in the past. This gel is watery. It came with no instructions either. I also noticed that carbamide peroxide was not listed in the ingredients. I've noticed zero different in my teeth and wish I hadn't wasted my money.
customer_reviews.author: jack h.

customer_reviews.title: Will continue trying
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived really fast which was great, I saw people having such amazing reaults after one use so I had high expectations. I used exactly as directed with custom trays I have and left on for 40 minutes and didn’t see any results after the first use. I saw better results with Opalesence 20%, comparing first use of each. Giving it the benefit of the doubt I will try for a few more days and see what happens. I would like to still try the whitening pen for on the go whitening, hopefully it will be great!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Angeles

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: Just had my teeth cleaned today and the hygienist asked how I keep my teeth so white. This product is the BEST I’ve ever used. I have my own trays and squirt the mix in and bam - first use I saw a difference. Good stuff!!
customer_reviews.author: Sailmcghee

customer_reviews.title: Results and gentle
customer_reviews.text: I’m not one to usually right reviews, but rely so heavily on others so I figured it was my turn. I was hesitant to try this product because I have sensitive teeth and in the past could never use any whiting product long enough to see results. I’ve used this product for about one week almost daily for 30 minutes at a time and have seen results! I haven’t noticed much if any increased sensitivity.
customer_reviews.author: Aly

customer_reviews.title: STUFF WORKS GREAT, taste is bad
customer_reviews.text: STUFF WORKS GREAT, taste is bad. Whitened my teeth in 4 applications, I had sever staining due to coffee, this stuff worked, however it's taste leaves much to be desired.
customer_reviews.author: pitvpr

customer_reviews.title: What an amazing product!
customer_reviews.text: What I enjoy the most about this product is that it actually whitens your teeth instantly. I would highly recommend this product to everyone who loves to have a great big white smile. I receive numerous of comments on how white my teeth appear, thanks to AuraGlow! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old, expired product
customer_reviews.text: I got this for Christmas and didn't use it until a month later. The box says it expires 10/21, but the gel had expired after 6 weeks. It's completely liquified and when I went to put it on my mouth tray it runs out on to the counter. I can't return it or use it. I'm extremely disappointed in this product. Zero stars if I could.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally a product that doesn’t cause tooth sensitivity
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd round of buying this product (first time I bought the whole kit with the light enhancer mouthpiece) I Would have liked the whitening to be more drastic given that I had to use all of the syringes past the 10 days to get to desired whitening I was looking for. To be fair though, I’m a daily coffee drinker and I wasn’t ever able to whiten with the typical whitening products as I have pretty bad tooth sensitivity. This product however, does not cause any problems for me so at least there is that!
customer_reviews.author: V-G

customer_reviews.title: Just gotta give it a try and see if it works for you
customer_reviews.text: Took a bit of time for me to see results, but I have always had soft enamel and am lacking in areas. I'll also attribute that to being a 1 cup of coffee a day kind of person. I'm sure everyone will have varying results, just gotta give it a try and see if it works for you.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Bradford

customer_reviews.title: Great product so far I have a thing with having ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product so far I have a thing with having white teeth this has done the job. I've used it a few times now and it's worked great no sensitivity or anything. Only thing I'm not crazy about is they don't give you a brush to apply the gel so I have to use a q tip
customer_reviews.author: Thomas T.

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it with the mouth guards I had to prevent grinding my teeth at night and it seems to be working well. I have applied it 3 times so far and I see a difference. I have been using a little at a time and increasing the amount of gel each time because I was nervous it might hurt my gums. It hasn't hurt at all yet and I will continue to use it a few times a week until I stop seeing improvements.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It Works!!
customer_reviews.text: I have tried all kinds of whitening for my teeth, including the dentist's office and I did not see a difference with any of them. AuraGlow actually works. As an aside I recently bought an amazing new electric toothbrush and I believe that the whitening gel is actually working in tandem with my new Sonic Caare brush. I am definitely happy with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy S. Proctor

customer_reviews.title: Works great and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I've tried several home whitening products and also had teeth whitening in the dentist office. This is definitely one of the better products I've tried. While none of the products matches the dentist whitening, it definitely outweighs the cost for me. Great product. Saw results in a week of treatments. Seemed to work better for me "painting" gel on with que tip and then used tray and light.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This product works pretty well.
customer_reviews.text: I can see a difference in my teeth before and after (although not an overwhelming difference) they are a little whiter. To be fair, I only ordered the gel and have not used with a tray yet. I have ordered trays because I can tell the gel does not stay on my teeth very well without using a tray. I will update this review if I see amazing results after using the tray.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Questionable Whether There Is Any Additional Benefit in Ordering AuraGlow Refill Gel
customer_reviews.text: I must admit I was disappointed. I purchased the full AuraGlow kit and completed all the gel that was included by applying daily. Then I ordered the gel refill and once again applied all the gel daily until there was none remaining. I had ordered the refill because my teeth had barely lightened after I finished the original kit. Unfortunately my teeth did not lighten any further after using the refill. FYI, I do not smoke or drink coffee, tea or any other beverage that would stain teeth.
customer_reviews.author: Marcia

customer_reviews.title: Good Product
customer_reviews.text: I got these after running out of the syringes that came with my kit. I still like my kit but these dont seem to be as potent as the ones that came with the original kit. It my just be the mint taste thats throwing me off.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine L.

customer_reviews.title: Little messy, but works!
customer_reviews.text: The system was easy to use. It comes with a soft plastic mouthpiece that you apply the whitening gel to. The gel comes in syringes so it's easy to use the recommended amount. Then you put the mouthpiece in and attach the blue light . You wear this for about 20 mins. I didnt like how messy it feels. As my mouth created saliva, I felt like I couldn't swallow and I felt like it dilutes the gel from my teeth. Not bad for the price though.
customer_reviews.author: clp406

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed Teeth
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe these turned to a liquid like water in less than 6 months. They exploded when I opened them after not using any for a couple of months. I was so disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Flower

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product before it was great. Just a few weeks ago received it
customer_reviews.text: DON'T BUY IT!!! Bought this product before it was great. Just a few weeks ago received it. 3 syringes - one 1/2 full the other 2 - 1/4 full. All runny liquid,. Could not use. Seller never responded to my complaint. Buy from someone else!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jane Tiberio

customer_reviews.title: VERY strong whitening gel. After just three applications I ...
customer_reviews.text: VERY strong whitening gel. After just three applications I noticed nearly all my staining was gone. BUT it will affect your gums with some irritation over time (bleeding, etc). So be careful how much / how often you apply.
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Foxworthy

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: I stopped using this daily after day 5 consistently because I got lazy lol. However I used it once for 3 weeks so far after the 5 consistent days- I cant complain at all- I see a noticeable difference especially in photos I have taken- I am going to attempt to do it every other day a few more times until the recommended 10 used in a row, and then use it for maintenance- (I used this in conjunction w charcoal toothpaste)
customer_reviews.author: Lauren NY

customer_reviews.title: Actually works
customer_reviews.text: I had a bleaching system from my dentist that didn't seem to work. My teeth got whiter, but I had a lot of sensitivity and I was going through a lot of whitener. Auraglow actually works! My teeth are pretty resistant to whitening, but they are definietly getting whiter with successive treatments.
customer_reviews.author: Damon H.

customer_reviews.text: I have natural teeth next to a crown; the naturals have to be bleached regularly so that the single crown doesn't look out of place. The 44% is the highest percentage I have found and I don't have to use it as long or as frequently to maintain the grill.
customer_reviews.author: Karley Root

customer_reviews.title: Successful and pleased with results
customer_reviews.text: I used this with a whitening light and found it very effective. I applied with a cotton swab for preciseness. I left it on for 40 minutes, four consecutive nights and was pleased with the results. It did not cause discomfort, although I did not leave it on beyond 40 minutes and rinsed well afterward.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Holmes

customer_reviews.title: PROS: 1. Does the job. 2. ...
customer_reviews.text: PROS: 1. Does the job. 2. A little goes a long way. CON: Not sure if high cost is justified over all other whiteners.
customer_reviews.author: JSM

customer_reviews.title: The best whitening gel yet!!
customer_reviews.text: I am impressed with this whitening gel. I noticed the difference the first time. I use it ever other day and my teeth are looking whiter and my smile brighter. I smoke occasionally but you would never have known.
customer_reviews.author: Debra A. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: No thx
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't seem right. No tingle no burn. I have a hard time believing this is genuine product. It bubbled slightly. I used once for 30 min. I use 5 min whitening and CVS brand whitening and there's no way this is 44% no tingle is a big red flag for me.
customer_reviews.author: Starr

customer_reviews.title: not without the trays
customer_reviews.text: I never whitened my teeth before and thought this would come all inclusive but it does not come with trays and they are pretty expensive so it sits in a draw...
customer_reviews.author: tealeyez

customer_reviews.title: but I'm satisfied with the product overall
customer_reviews.text: It's noticeable after the first use the difference it makes. Some gel accidentally spilled over the top when I put the tray in and it burned the top of my lip, but I'm satisfied with the product overall.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda S.

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy 😊
customer_reviews.text: I already had the dentist made teeth trays & usually got the gel at my dental office. I found the dentist gel burned my gums after 15 minutes & it was required to have the best outcome you sleep with the trays in...I couldn’t do it. I found this gel on Amazon & gave it a try. I was so happy with the outcome just after a few weeks. The best part is...no gum burning & the flavor is fine. Very happy new customer. Thank you 😊
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Love this company & product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! I have used it before. I previously purchased the kit that has the light, the mouth piece, and the gel. I was so impressed with the results and it is a part of my weekly routine now. I purchased these refills to continue my routine! My product arrived quickly and the syringes were in perfect condition!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it’s okay.
customer_reviews.text: The gel has active ingredients that cause the peroxide to have bubbles. But the gel quickly expires if not before, then shortly after arrival
customer_reviews.author: CAPxx

customer_reviews.title: IT WORKS!
customer_reviews.text: I already had my trays from previous whitening experience so started as soon as I received my product. I notice that it was working after a couple of sessions. The minty flavor is nice. I did not have any irritation to gums. Will definitely continue using this product and recommend AuraGlow 44%!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Burns skin, not as advertised
customer_reviews.text: 1st tube worked okay but the other 2 tubes liquified and when it got in my hands it left a chemical burn that turned my skin blistery white and stung.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent results
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this once the syringes that came with the blue light ran out. The original syringes I got worked GREAT. This order seemed to be a different formula though, the consistency is different and doesn’t whiten nearly as well. The original I noticed my teeth were much whiter in as little as 3 uses. After 7 uses with this order I can barely see a difference. I will probably try to order one more time, because the original was soo effective.
customer_reviews.author: Dayna  Andresen

customer_reviews.title: half of it turned from gel to liquid
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great when I used the first two cartridges, but two months after I got it, I noticed that the rest of the cartridges had turned to liquid! No way can you put liquid bleach in your mouth! Not worth the money as it turned out.
customer_reviews.author: GwenMare

customer_reviews.title: LOT 5826 EXP 10/21 is Defective
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the kit. The trays and gel were great. I later ordered these refill gels. They arrived as gel, but turned liquid while stored in my bathroom in the plastic tray inside the manufacture's package. The product leaked out of the unopened syringes at the plunge handle. They are worthless. Such a shame. I would love to buy again, but can no longer trust the product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Receiving a returned product?
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with the product packing - these boxes are crumpled and the sealing tape is peeling off. I am pretty sure I received a returned product? Unacceptable at this price.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It is convenient and easy to do especially if you have Invisalign braces. Just put the gel in your braces and wait the allotted time. So simple and life changer.
customer_reviews.author: JEN L.

customer_reviews.title: Works like a charm!
customer_reviews.text: I can't believe how well this really works! Teeth are noticably whiter and continue to whiten more and more. I'm so glad I decided to purchase this product and plan to purchase more for the entire family.
customer_reviews.author: Happiness in Delaware

customer_reviews.title: I love the results
customer_reviews.text: Works well, though it does tend to squish everywhere so I constantly have to spit it out.. I love the results, squish not withstanding!
customer_reviews.author: Mz Z

customer_reviews.title: Easy DIY Method for a Whiter, More Attractive Smile!
customer_reviews.text: Received my order promptly and securely packaged. After reading and following the instructions for using the whitening gel, I was pleasantly surprised! There was no harsh taste and no irritation whatsoever as I have experienced with other teeth bleaching products. While this was only my first application, I could see a slight whitening effect already! Excited to see what the results will be after a full week!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Michael

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: I started using this item approximately a year ago. I started seeing results on the 4th day and drastic results in the 10th day of usage. I used sensodyne tooth paste so I'm not sure if using this product alone causes sensitivity but I did not get any at all and I used the product for 14 consecutive days. I now use this product as maintenance.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Having used this product several years now I was surprised when the gel turned to liquid after only a month at home. When i contacted the manufacture for a replacement order, four times before I got a response, they said it was my fault for storing it in a overly warm location. I stored it in the same place the previous three orders were stored. Finding fault with the customer is not customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Get something without Peroxide. This is trash.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff literally killed my gums. I used it once and it killed the skin on my gums around my teeth. Which was stellar every time I brushed my teeth for the next three days. Literally bleeding gums. Terrible. Trash. (Although I guess my teeth did get a bit whiter)
customer_reviews.author: Olivia L Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great for at home whitening.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this gel. I use it with my led mouthpiece and there is an instant difference in the color of my teeth. No sensitivity of problems afterwards.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: It works!
customer_reviews.text: works fine. Be careful if you her it on you when filling the teays. It drips easily and I got a thin line on my hand. Oh bity did I run to rinse it off. Really burned. No damage done though. Next time I am staying next to a water source that is already on! Visibly brightened on first application
customer_reviews.author: Morganluvr

customer_reviews.title: Great for those with sensitive teeth
customer_reviews.text: I have extremely sensitive teeth and this product whitens without making my teeth hurt. My teeth were fairly white to begin with, but this product made them sparkle. I started noticing a difference after 3 applications, and got the results I wanted in about 2 weeks. I wish it came with a little brush or something to apply the gel with, but I used a qtip and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Received bad batch -- very ineffective
customer_reviews.text: The first syringe I used worked -- gums were sensitive, teeth whiter -- as with other gel whiteners. But by the time I used the second syringe it had totally lost its effectiveness. Of course I'm now outside the return window. So either just one bad batch that had degraded, or a bad product overall. I won't be ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Noticeably whiter teeth only a couple of uses!!
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the look of my teeth after using this product. I had my own mouth plates made by my dentist, so using this product was super easy. Brush, add the gel to your plate (a little goes a long way) and put them in ur mouth. Noticeably whiter teeth after just a couple of uses! The only negative was that sometimes the excess kind of burns my tongue, but that fades quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ellen DeJesus

product_meta.title: AuraGlow Teeth Whitening Gel Syringe Refill Pack, 44% Carbamide Peroxide, (3X) 5ml Syringes
product_meta.description:
If you're reading this, you most likely have stained or yellow teeth, whether it be from the consumption of coffee, soda, wine, smoking or something else. Did you know whiter teeth can can make you look 10 years younger, and also more attractive? That’s right, whiter teeth can lead to a better personal and social life, as well as advance you in other aspects of your career and relationships. 

Finally, you can achieve that whiter smile with this whitening gel pack that safely removes years of stains from your teeth, in just 30 minutes per day — without the high dentist price tag. 


How to Use Teeth Whitening Gel
Gel refill pack contains 3x 5mL syringes with a total of 30 treatments (10 per syringe). The gel can be used with a mouth tray (not included) or painted onto the teeth and worn for 30 minutes per day. Recommended use is for 7-10 days or until your desired whitening results are achieved. 


Trusted by Dentists
Our whitening gel is made in the USA in compliant facilities with safety and high-quality standards in mind. Our gels are trusted by dental professionals, and used in various practices throughout the country for at-home and chairside whitening. 


Instructions
Remove the cap from the gel syringe and fill a mouth tray (not included) on the top and bottom with a total of 0.5mL of gel. Alternatively, you may dispense the gel into a small dish and paint it onto each tooth. Wear for 30 minutes per day for best results. Shorter whitening sessions may also be conducted for maintenance and touch ups. Recap the syringe until your next treatment and use until empty. Store in a cool, dry place.
feature_bullets: Our strongest formula for the deepest stains. Teeth whitening gel refill pack includes (3x) 5mL gel syringes for a total of 15mL. Each syringe contains 10 whitening treatments (based on recommended .5mL per use) for a total of 30+ treatments in this refill pack.

Whitening gel contains dental-grade 44% carbamide peroxide in mint-flavor. Removes years of stains from coffee, wine, soda, tea, smoking and more. This is a stronger bleaching gel and is not recommended for those with known sensitivity issues.

To use bleaching gel, squeeze .5mL of gel into a mouth tray (not included) and wear for 30 minutes. Alternatively, you may squeeze the gel into a small bowl or dish and paint onto your teeth to whiten. Repeat this process for 7-10 days until desired results are achieved.
If used as directed, most customers see results in as little as 1 treatment. The gel is safe for enamel as well as caps, crowns and veneers.
Gel is made in the USA which it is safe and highly effective. The gel is gluten-free, kosher and cruelty-free using high-quality ingredients.
